revised_title: A Mechanical Critical Inquiry into the Nature of Hermaphrodites
tldr: The author, James Parsons, presents a historical and critical analysis of the concept of hermaphrodites in human nature. He argues that the general opinion of the world regarding the existence of hermaphrodites is incorrect and that such individuals are either deformed or diseased. Parsons provides a detailed methodical approach to disprove the existence of hermaphrodites and offers a favorable reception from the Royal Society.
